name: ALT
title: ALT
description: This value set represents alanine transaminase  (ALT) laboratory tests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Alanine transaminase blood, serum or plasma laboratory tests),(Data Element Scope: ALT laboratory tests on blood, serum or plasma),(Inclusion Criteria: ALT tests performed on blood, serum or plasma),(Exclusion Criteria: ALT tests performed on specimens that are not blood, serum or plasma, along with other liver function tests (e.g., AST))
